value.title: Reminder - Install WebView2 to Get Latest Updates from Power BI Desktop
value.excerpt: This video, is the reminder for the updating your system with WebView2 if you want to receive, Power BI Desktop updates from February 2022. value.title: Sort a table using Multiple Columns in Power BI | Multi Column Sort in Power  BI
